name: Laboratory R&D
desc:
Trade with $theFaction R&D facility.

Rare and advanced ships, weapons and other military hardware can be bought here. A high standing with $theFaction is required to purchase most wares.

Will buy locally rare, valuable or exotic goods as part of a no-questions-asked requisitions program, although the cost of the permits involved in trading directly with the Complex tend to claim most of the profits.
